items.title: President Trump's Tariffs Have Arrived. 3 Things to Do to Protect Your Portfolio.
items.author: Adria Cimino
items.description: The article discusses strategies for investors to protect their portfolios amid the market turmoil caused by the broader-than-expected tariff announcement by President Trump. It suggests holding on to well-established companies, considering companies that may benefit from the tariffs, and investing in Dividend Kings for passive income.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article suggests that well-established companies like Nvidia have historically recovered and gained over time, even during tough market conditions.
The article suggests that well-established companies like Walmart have historically recovered and gained over time, even during tough market conditions.
The article suggests that Amazon may benefit from the tariffs, as they could boost the company's competitiveness against foreign rivals like Shein.
The article suggests that Etsy may benefit from the tariffs, as they could boost the company's competitiveness against foreign rivals like Shein.

The article recommends investing in Dividend Kings, such as Coca-Cola, which have a history of increasing their dividend payments and have the financial strength to continue doing so even during difficult times.

The article recommends investing in Dividend Kings, such as Johnson & Johnson, which have a history of increasing their dividend payments and have the financial strength to continue doing so even during difficult times.

The article recommends investing in Dividend Kings, such as Abbott Laboratories, which have a history of increasing their dividend payments and have the financial strength to continue doing so even during difficult times.
